name: StarPoPaDo
description:
With a team of 6 participating in the Global Game Jam which as Roots as theme, we glad to present you our game StarPaPaDo made in only 48 hours.

First we have brainstorm to decide in which direction to go and how to apply the theme in our game. Finally we chose the origins of video games.

The roots of the game... From a 2 buttons gameplay to a 3D spaceship (re)discover the origins of video games.
